edits.corrected_text: Do you mean the Marseilles people?
edits.original_text: Do you mean the Marseilles people

edits.corrected_text: As to Marseilles, we know what Marseilles is.
edits.original_text: As to Marseilles, we know what Marseilles is

edits.corrected_text: It couldn't exist without allonging and marshonging to something or other—victory or death, or blazes, or something.
edits.original_text: It couldn't exist without allonging and marshonging to something or other—victory or death, or blazes, or something

edits.corrected_text: The speaker, with a whimsical good humour upon him all the time, looked over the parapet-wall with the greatest disparagement of Marseilles; and taking up a determined position by putting his hands in his pockets, and rattling his money at it, apostrophised it with a short laugh.
edits.original_text: The speaker, with a whimsical good humour upon him all the time, looked over the parapet-wall with the greatest disparagement of Marseilles; and taking up a determined position by putting his hands in his pockets, and rattling his money at it, apostrophised it with a short laugh

edits.corrected_text: I think, to let other people allong and marshong about their lawful business, instead of shutting 'em up in quarantine!
edits.original_text: I think, to let other people allong and marshong about their lawful business, instead of shutting 'em up in quarantine

edits.corrected_text: But we shall be out to-day.
edits.original_text: But we shall be out to-day

edits.corrected_text: It's almost an aggravation of the enormity, that we shall be out to-day.
edits.original_text: It's almost an aggravation of the enormity, that we shall be out to-day

edits.corrected_text: What have we ever been in for?
edits.original_text: What have we ever been in for
